markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Anadi Lore](/Feats.aspx?ID=2762) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Anadi" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=255" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 103 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You've learned how to provide for your community, be it through hard-earned sustenance or useful crafts. You gain the trained proficiency rank in [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) and [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16). If you would automatically become trained in one of those skills (from your background or class, for example), you become trained in a skill of your choice. You also become trained in [Anadi Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8).
name: Anadi Lore
